== Video Overview ==

Some Linux distributions including Ubuntu cannot play MP3s "out of the box". This video details how to make MP3s play.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who wish to play MP3 audio files.

== Pre-requisites ==

* An MP3 file to play or an audio CD to rip
* Functioning sound hardware

== Required Knowledge ==

None

== Recommended Knowledge ==

None

== Objectives ==

* Describe why MP3s aren't playable out of the box on many Linux distributions.
* Outline the necessary configuration and steps required to enable MP3 player support.
* Rip a test MP3 from an audio CD.
* Play an MP3.
* Learn about alternatives to MP3.

== Links ==

* https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats
